member.name: M:Elect.Data.IO.FileUtils.FileHelper.MakeValidFileName(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Char},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replaces characters in fileName that are not allowed in file names with the specified replacement character.
member.param: Text to make into a valid filename. The same string is returned if it is valid already.
Replacement character, or null to simply remove bad characters.
Whether to replace quotes and slashes with the non-ASCII characters ” and ⁄.
member.returns: A string that can be used as a filename. If the output string would otherwise be empty, returns as string.
member.remarks: Valid file name also follow maximum length is 260 characters rule (split from right to left if length > 260)

member.name: T:Elect.Data.IO.ImageUtils.ResizeUtils.Models.ResizeType
member.summary: Enumerated resize modes to apply to resized images.

member.name: F:Elect.Data.IO.ImageUtils.ResizeUtils.Models.ResizeType.Crop
member.summary: Crops the resized image to fit the bounds of its container.

member.name: F:Elect.Data.IO.ImageUtils.ResizeUtils.Models.ResizeType.Pad
member.summary: Pads the resized image to fit the bounds of its container. If only one dimension is passed, will maintain the original aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Elect.Data.IO.ImageUtils.ResizeUtils.Models.ResizeType.BoxPad
member.summary: Pads the image to fit the bound of the container without resizing the original source. When downscaling, performs the same functionality as

member.name: F:Elect.Data.IO.ImageUtils.ResizeUtils.Models.ResizeType.Max
member.summary: Constrains the resized image to fit the bounds of its container maintaining the original aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Elect.Data.IO.ImageUtils.ResizeUtils.Models.ResizeType.Min
member.summary: Resizes the image until the shortest side reaches the set given dimension. Upscaling is disabled in this mode and the original image will be returned if attempted.

member.name: F:Elect.Data.IO.ImageUtils.ResizeUtils.Models.ResizeType.Stretch
member.summary: Stretches the resized image to fit the bounds of its container.
